method.name: print_tree_to_string
method.description:
Returns the hierarchy tree from a specific node as a string.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_node := $MyNode as Node var tree := SxNode.print_tree_to_string(my_node) ----

method.name: print_tree_pretty_to_string
method.description:
Returns the "pretty" hierarchy tree from a specific node as a string.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var my_node := $MyNode as Node var tree := SxNode.print_tree_pretty_to_string(my_node) ----
